title: Games freezes and starts a buzzing sound
body:
When i play csgo or LoL, my pc will freeze and will make a buzzing sound.
The only way i can turn it off is from the power button.
The (important) components of my pc:
Asus
Intel core i5-5200 CPU 2.20 GHz 
8 GB RAM
64-bit operative system
windows 10 home

PLZ HELP ME

replies.body: The buzzing and freezing is an issue reported by a few players, and it appears to be an issue after updating Windows 10.  Specifically, the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) seems to be interacting oddly with League.  Disabling that per the link should fix this up!
